name: forMyHeart
0:
”Alexa, open my heart”
”Alexa, tell my heart to get my latest blood pressure”
”Alexa, tell my heart to add a new blood pressure”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my heart
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Designed for managing blood pressure. ForMyHeart is an app for self-care of patients with hypertension and chronic cardiovascular diseases.
In connection with ForMyHeart mobile app, this skill is a tool that enables you to add a new blood pressure measurement or get your latest one.

Web application: https://formyheart.app
Android app: http://bit.ly/3NjIJjJ
IOS app: https://apple.co/3teZztd

DISCLAIMER
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
